review: The directions were clear and very easy to follow. Everything needed was included in the package. Very very, satisfied so far.

review: Just beginning to use this.  So far we're very pleased.

review: Wonderful!  Worked as expected.  Great to be connected to Amazon and all the add-ons

review: Meets all my expectations. Very simple to operate and gain access to Prime movies and other content.

review: Doesn't work as well as the fire TV. Internet connection issues.

review: Easy to set up and use. Tons of movies and tv shows. You can always find something to watch
